name: Critter Sprint
description:
Title: Critter Sprint

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, Casual Gamers

Game Overview: 
Your name is Critter. You a live on the outer reaches of the cosmos. You had just happened to be platform hopping during your morning walk when trouble finds you! Floating eyeb units are staring at you. You hate being stared at. Teach them a lesson.

Instructions:
Up Arrow Key - Starts the Game / Jump (hold up key to jump higher or tap for a shorter jump)
Down Arrow Key - Accelerate descent  while in the air
Space - Fire Bullets
Escape Key = Pause/Unpause

Critter Sprint is an endless runner game where the objective is to get a high score while surviving as long you can.  You get a point for shooting an Eyeb unit. 

Game Design Team:

Connor Touchet - Game Designer
